thread.title: BRIEF-Iconix Reports Q4 Non-Gaap Earnings Per Share $0.06 From Continuing Operations

title: BRIEF-Iconix Reports Q4 Non-Gaap Earnings Per Share $0.06 From Continuing Operations

organizations.name: continuing operations reuters staff   iconix brand group inc

text: March 14, 2018 / 9:29 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Iconix Reports Q4 Non-Gaap Earnings Per Share $0.06 From Continuing Operations Reuters Staff   Iconix Brand Group Inc: * ICONIX REPORTS FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE FOURTH QUARTER & FULL YEAR 2017 * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.06 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * SEES FY REVENUE $190 MILLION TO $220 MILLION * SEES 2018 ‍GAAP NET INCOME GUIDANCE OF $7 MILLION TO $17 MILLION, AND $20 MILLION TO $30 MILLION ON A NON-GAAP BASIS​ * REITERATES FULL YEAR 2018 REVENUE GUIDANCE * SEES 2018 ‍FULL YEAR FREE CASH FLOW OF APPROXIMATELY $50 MILLION TO $70 MILLION ​ * QTRLY LICENSING REVENUE $52.3 MILLION VERSUS $58.8 MLN‍​ Source text for Eikon:
